description: The head of Lebanon's largest military force says the death of Saleh al-Arouri will be avenged.
maintext: Miri Eisin, a retired colonel from the Israel Defense Forces (IDF) told the BBC that the Hamas deputy was "living in the heart of the Dahiya, in the heart of the Hezbollah area of Beirut" and that he was the "direct connection between Hamas and Hezbollah".
title: Saleh al-Arouri: Hamas leader's death 'won't go unpunished', says Hezbollah chief
